name: Get The Mutant!
description:
Your classmates at wizard just found out that you have ears. In other words, you are a mutant! And now they want to kill you.

  • Adapt!
    • Your mutation completely changes every round. This completely changes how the player controls and before you can situated, another wave begins.
  • Strategize!
    • How is the challenge rising? What do I have to count on to regenerate health? Find the answers to these questions and you will survive.
  • …And remember, you're surrounded.
    • Watch the battlefield slowly turn into a "bullet-hell".

I streamed this whole journey and it was a long 47 hours but it was so worth it. Thank you everyone who joined this. 

… I didn't have time to make a credits
